The Last of Us 2 is a wild ride full of gut-wrenching pain\, witty banter\, and a harrowing tale of revenge\, and the rot it leaves in its wake. The Last of Us 2 sets out to drive a message deep into the player\, and my God it delivers.That brings me to the recent controversy surrounding this game. As well as it's unjust and unwarranted review bombing. It makes me sick to see so much work\, and effort being spat on\, and hated by so many\, for such a stupid reason.
